text:
@RealJamesWoods People definitely don't become immune to common colds or the flu. Perhaps by immunity to a virus they actually mean immunity to [some aspects of] coronavirus' resultant syndrome. 
(By comparison, HIV is to AIDS what Coronavirus is to COVID-19.    Virus➡️Syndrome)
